sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The World Health Organization publishes its global tobacco trends report, which reveals smoking numbers are on the decline.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Chaos as bad weather swept across northern Europe on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: In Denmark, heavy snow and strong winds have made conditions dangerous on the roads, with several accidents backing up traffic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Rail transport was also impacted, with the police advising people to work from home and postpone appointments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: In the Norwegian capital, Oslo, poor visibility and heavy snow saw bus services halted, leaving many people stranded.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The bad weather has disrupted road traffic, particularly across the south of the country, and delayed rail services.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The city's airport was closed, and officials have been advising people to stay home.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: And things are slippery in France's north-eastern Lorraine region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: It was placed on the country's second alert level orange because of icy rain and snow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Numerous accidents have also been reported and public transport impacted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: And Meteo France has warned of snow and rain over much of the northeast of the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: In Germany, around 700 flights were cancelled due to extreme weather conditions at its Frankfurt hub, while in Munich, around 250 planes stayed on the runway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Heavy snowfall and freezing rain is also causing delays and cancellations at other German airports.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: On the roads, there were several accidents, creating traffic chaos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Much of the south of the country is on red alert.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: And Belgium's southern Luxembourg region is also on red alert due to freezing rain that is impacting road traffic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Eight months after the devastating floods in Italy's Emilia-Romagna region, the European Commission president on Wednesday announced a 1.2 billion euro aid package.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Ursula von der Leyen was speaking during a visit with Italian Prime Minister Giorgio Maloney to the town of Forli, one of the worst hit by the floods.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The European Union, this was the message, is by your side from day one on and the message today is that we continue to stand by your side.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: We want to help you to come back to your feet, to become more resilient and for example to improve flood protection or repair public infrastructure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Heavy rains and floods swept the region last spring, killing 15 people and causing billions of euros worth of damage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Von der Leyen attributed their severity following months of extreme drought to climate change and emphasized the need for more protection measures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: European Union parliamentarians on Wednesday voted overwhelmingly in favor of a new directive that bans misleading environmental claims about products.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: This means that using terms like climate neutral or environmentally friendly will no longer be allowed without concrete evidence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: And this must be authorized by approved certification schemes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The new rule aims to protect consumers from misleading marketing and allow them to make sustainable choices.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Member states have two years to introduce the new rules.

Macron also spoke about the situation in Gaza, saying France is going to keep pushing for diplomatic solutions to call for a ceasefire. everybody. Great honor. Thank you very much. Thank you.

sentences.sentence: Trump's landslide victory in the Iowa Republican caucus could be a concern for Europe. A Trump return to the White House could mean a new EU-U.S. trade tariff war after four years of relative calm during the Biden administration. During Trump's first mandate, the U.S. il primo mandato di Trump, gli Stati Uniti hanno imposto tariffe che potrebbe da un lato portarlo a più miti consigli. Dall'altro lato è pur vero che anche con questa amministrazione, seppur con toni decisamente più distesi e una certa... sto stare nel tempo quello che potrebbe essere il problema soprattutto sull'acciaio e l'alluminio, non abbiamo visto un paese estremamente collaborativo. trade is not the only issue the EU is worried about. The US has been the biggest donor to Ukraine in almost two years of war. But now Washington can't agree on new funds for Kyiv, despite growing pressure from Ukraine's president, Volodymyr Zelensky.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: This is only the first chapter in a very long race. Despite Trump's Iowa victory, the former president needs more to secure the Republican candidacy and get his shot to beat Biden in the elections.
